name: Town Portal
effect:
:effect_map: Move your [Hero](../heroes/index.md) to a selected [Town](../towns/index.md) or Settlement in your control, and:

:empower: 0 ➣ No additional effect
:empower: 2 ➣ +1 :movement:
:empower: 4 ➣ +2 :movement:

— OR —

:instant: +1 :empower:
notes: [^1] If the selected town already has a hero in it, and the teleporting hero would not be able to move out of the city during this turn, they can not teleport to the town.
